jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
Become a part of the winter internship- where you will get a peek of what it takes and how it feels to work in the Data Science field in Gojek. 

The timeline from this internship program is:
December 16th, 2019 - February 14th, 2020

This application will close on November 30th, 2019
jobsJson.description:
Become a part of the winter internship- where you will get a peek of what it takes and how it feels to work in the Data Science field in Gojek. 

The timeline from this internship program is:
December 16th, 2019 - February 14th, 2020

This application will close on November 30th, 2019
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• You will directly work with one of the embedded DS teams
  • You can expect your work to extend over a few or all of the following: conduct deep-dive analysis, feature engineering, modeling, deploying to production, driving improvement in product features, etc. 
  • You will receive mentorship throughout your time as an intern
  • You will partake in DS sharing sessions and a final showcase

• 3rd or final year student studying a quantitative degree (Mathematics / Economics / Physics / Engineering / Computer Science etc)
  • You must be passionate about data science and machine learning! As a Data Science intern, you will contribute to current projects and experience your work have a real impact
  • Basic skills in Python, especially libraries such as Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib/Seaborn
  • Comfortable with SQL 
  • Should have a solid statistics foundation
  • Curious, able to learn independently and a good team player
  • High learning agility
  • Passionate about Data
